column5: For you Letterkenny fanshttps://www.thebeerstore.ca/beers/puppers-premium-lagerOtherwise, you have not lived until you suckled upon a cold Crannog's Backhand Of God while jigging a minnow. Put those other big Canadian name brand beers to shame.Creemore is right up there on my go to list. as is Granville Island Winter Ale. Nectar boys, pure nectar.
Moosehead
I go to CANADA to drink beer not coffee (although i do have coffee in the morning. Crannog's taste like coffee with a hint of Chocolate ! It's a lady's drink 🤣
Ummm, BHoG is a stout. But dont tell the Irish stout is a Lady's drink. Thats a bar fight for another day.
Steam Whistle

Freakin love Letterkenny! I did find you can buy Puppers at the beer store in FT Frances! I hope the store is open when I cross as I need to get some for myself and a friend who is a fan as well! Pitter patter let's get at er!
Blue and Kokanee for me!
Moosehead
Blue or moosehead works for us.
100% Blue Light in a bottle. However, it's cans only the past few years at duty free (at least in Baudette/I Falls).
I'll belly up for a ice cold root.
I've had it and it's terrible.
Well i will still try it but mostly i want a can to put in my display case as a fan of the show! Molson is for the after fishing drink!
You sure it wasn't sitting on the shelf in the fish cleaning house for a few years ? PjShorthorn
Importing Corona anytime as Canadian beer sucks however at least they can distill whiskey quite well.
Mines Molson Canadian, Kokanee, Blue. This year as I am a big fan of Letterkenny I am going to try and find a 12er of Puppers to try.
was Blue and Kokanee but now I just do not drink beer. Not a beer in the past 20 some years. I am mixed drink guy for some reason.

I have always gone with Labatts Blue. Molson is too sweet like Bud is. My house beer is Yuengling but beer fridge usually has a variety of IPAs and such. Usually small brewers from my home state or area (Jackie O's, Big Timber, etc)
Great Western Classic ,Original 16 Copper Ale, Alexander Keith.
I am a Blue fan, Molsons is ok as is Kokanee. wmd
Elsinore then Labatts Blue
Creemore Premium Lager !!

What he said, Creemore hands down. A small micro brewery in Ontario which was rated as number one for many years. Bought out by Molson a few years ago but it seems they haven't changed a thing except it isn't available in the 500ml brown glass bottle any more.

Ahhhhhh ..another Letterkenny fan . Your beer selection lines up as well. We could definitely fish together ..LOL. I literally tried to find Puppers in different LCBOs and Beer Stores on a trip back in 2019. No luck. I think it may be sold online though. PjShorthorn
Sleeman, Kokanee, Free. ; )
